steampowered.ponder.tag.steam.descriptio: Components related to steam production and usage
kubejs.ponder.assembly.text_3: If the vent doesnt face the Tuyere, the Bellow will not work
kubejs.ponder.assembly.text_4: R-Click to push air in using the Bellow
kubejs.ponder.assembly.text_5: Another Tuyere can be added on this side, just make sure to check it's vent direction
kubejs.ponder.assembly.text_6: Another layer can be placed for 2x processing. You cannot stack another layer after this one
kubejs.ponder.basic_usage.text_3: You can either use GUI or automation input
kubejs.ponder.basic_usage.text_4: Ingredients can also insert into crucible on the top
kubejs.ponder.basic_usage.text_5: Coke coal can insert to the burners
kubejs.ponder.basic_usage.text_6: Products can be extracted from sides of the crucible part
kubejs.ponder.creosote_funnel_use.text_1: The Creosote Funnel can produce a certain amount of creosote oil after a Log Pile burns
kubejs.ponder.creosote_funnel_use.text_2: Surround it with four solid blocks on all sides.
kubejs.ponder.creosote_funnel_use.text_3: Place a Log Pile in the center.
kubejs.ponder.usage.text_1: To start processing, use Shift + R-Click with the first ore in hand (not blocks)
kubejs.ponder.usage.text_2: After the initial placement, R-Click the pile with the ore and charcoal
kubejs.ponder.usage.text_3: After filling it up, start it by using a firestarter
kubejs.ponder.usage.text_4: Once it's done burning, you can mine it up and collect the iron
